column1: Oullins (French pronunciation: ​[ulɛ̃]) is a commune in the Metropolis of Lyon in Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes region in eastern France.
It is a suburb of the city of Lyon
column2: and is adjacent to it on the southwest.
which is part of the TER Auvergne-Rhône-Alpes network
